body:
Comment 4: 
(Just for judging the speed of that HDD: on my home laptop with old i5 cpu with an SSD:
gthomas@waterhouse:~/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools$ time find $GOPATH/src -type d
2>/dev/null|wc -l 
18329

real    0m0.228s
user    0m0.088s
sys     0m0.136s

more than twice amount, in less than 1/621 th time)
